lead_paragraph: MC CANN--Michael P. In loving memory of a wonderful brother-in-law whose twenty-five year marriage to our beloved sister brought her, and us, great happiness. Alan & Colin 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MC CANN, MICHAEL P
